query: I need your help in creating a travel itinerary. My trip, starting from Richmond, will last for a week, during which I aim to visit 3 different cities in Texas from March 6th to March 12th, 2022. I'm traveling solo and have allocated a new budget of $3,800 for this journey.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Houston,Austin,Dallas]
